description:
With more than 70 years of experience, our team at Povall & Jeffreys, P.A., represents clients in Cleveland and throughout Mississippi. Our law firm handles personal injury, real estate, family law and workers' compensation cases. We have put millions of dollars back into the hands of people who have suffered a serious injury, we have resolved complicated family disputes, and we have overseen countless residential and commercial real estate transactions.

As a full-service law firm, we are able to meet all of our clients' needs in one place. Not only do we consistently reach their goals, but we also get there professionally and compassionately. Our attorneys have received a number of honors for their work. For example, Kirkham Povall has earned the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell. Attorney S. Todd Jeffreys has been listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100.

Working with us means working with a team that is:
• Available: We quickly respond to your questions.
• Honest: Our advice is straightforward and to the point.
• Resourceful: We are innovative in finding a solution in a timely manner.

Povall & Jeffreys, P.A., accepts credit cards. When an in-person meeting is not feasible, we are able to accommodate people with a virtual appointment.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
